website_summaries.verdict: Acer's Predator Helios 500 squeezes full-fat overclockable GeForce GTX 1070 performance into a 17-inch gaming laptop, but we'd like to see a bit more battery life and chassis polish.
cons: Keyboard lighting is programmable only by zones, not per-key

customer_reviews.title: Cool and powerful beast of a laptop!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing laptop!! Awesome graphics with the full 1070 and it keeps surprisingly cool during extended gaming sessions. Can't recommend this laptop enough. If you're on the fence or in the market and you don't mind a bulkier desktop replacement you should pull the trigger and pick one of these bad boys up. You'll be happy you did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Monster.  100% Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I got this after my ROG Strix Scar ii came in defective. This thing is great. The ONLY thing is that I wish you had more control over the RGB. Besides that, this machine is perfect for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Will Smith

customer_reviews.title: IT IS A POWERFUL PIECE OF GAMING TECH!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had laptops that were pretty damn good at playing movies and music, but wanted something more. My friends helped me find this beast. And now, sweet mercy, this one......I don't have enough positive adjectives to properly describe how fast and beautiful this laptop is.
customer_reviews.author: RAE

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this computer and loves it. He spent FOREVER in search for the "perfect" computer. He is happy with his purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Mills

customer_reviews.title: Totally Disappointed!!!! :(
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this laptop I was expecting a rock solid laptop. However what I got is a totally throttling and overheating issues. Additionally the gpu fan has been making rattling noise recently... I am not even talking about sudden weird temp rises here and there. Sending it back to Acer support is going to cost me more than 300usd which doesnt make any sense as I am in a different country other than US. I am so disappointed now ..
customer_reviews.author: Eldaniz

customer_reviews.title: Solid gaming rig. Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bught this machine to replace an Alienware 18 5R that I had just purchased and hated. This one however is much better. The keyboard layout, the feel, the sound, and the amount of thunderbolt ports are all a plus. It's also lightning fast and can play any new game at Ultra settings. Screen is beautiful and it runs fairly cool considering the processor and vid card. Overall, I am really impressed so far.
customer_reviews.author: Markus Khan

customer_reviews.title: I very like this laplop
customer_reviews.text: a nice cooling system a nice screen a nice speaker a nice price (U.S1600=NT49xxx) Because this product selling NT$80,000 in Taiwan :( Although , this laplop's material is mainly plastic , but does not affect it's durability sorry , english is not good, please forgive.
customer_reviews.author: Zeng Guan Jie

customer_reviews.title: Customer Support nightmare
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is great. My issue is with Acer support. I've had this laptop for 7 months and now get frequent BSODs. I've shipped it to Acer twice and they've yet to fix the faulty RAM. Their ability to diagnose and repair is horrible when all they do is re-install windows for you both times. This is over the process of almost 2 months. I'm now going to buy new RAM sticks and do the repair myself. And for that reason, DON'T buy this laptop. UPDATE: Acer replaced mine with an identical factory new laptop. The issue wasn't hardware, it was the new windows update
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room for storage and ram upgrades in the future.
customer_reviews.text: Using it fir 3D modelling and gaming. Games runs smooth at 60-140 fps and renders are quick.
customer_reviews.author: Ismael Dinally

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. Does everything I was looking for. I saw some people mentioned power drain but it didn't happen for me. At least not yet or maybe I'm not playing the same games and using the same software
customer_reviews.author: Doina "Day" Berndt dba Kalyana Design

customer_reviews.title: Awsome Gaming LT
customer_reviews.text: The Predator is Wonderful No Complaints so far it has taken anything I can throw at it
customer_reviews.author: Tom Winscher

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming laptop but terrible wireless card
customer_reviews.text: After having this laptop since Sept. 2018 the only complaint at all I have about it is that the killer wireless card is terrible. If they made this with a better wireless card it would be a full 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Traci E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best choice
customer_reviews.text: A very valuable gaming laptop. Love it so so much. Price is very fit with the quality. Best choice . Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Zhongtang

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Gaming Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great for 1080p gaming. It can handle any game I throw at it.
customer_reviews.author: Colin J Fakley

customer_reviews.title: Features are good but....
customer_reviews.text: True. This laptop is value for money. BUT it's biggest con is that it switches off in between, even though the battery is fully charged. I think there is something wrong with the power cord connector. True it switches on pretty quickly. But, it is very annoying if your laptop switches off in between your work. Especially if your work is unsaved. DON'T BUY THIS LAPTOP. Go for other better brands. And save your money and time.
customer_reviews.author: R4444

customer_reviews.title: Good seller.  1st one was defective, second was fine.  Replacement sent on contacting seller.
customer_reviews.text: On arrival box was fine but item had issues and was defective. Seller was contacted through amazon return request and the approved return for replacement. As soon as I printed out the label for return, before even able to drop off old one with UPS, the new laptop for replacement had arrived at my home! So far, the new laptop works great. The photo shows 1 color on laptop keyboard but it can be set to be a rainbow or any color you want in RGB sectrum, and it is silent and stays cool.
customer_reviews.author: foxysdchic

customer_reviews.title: This was not a good experience.  May never look back at Acer for gaming.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it Aug2018 I had the operating system reinstall multiple times. Predator sense stop working, I went back to the Acer website download it back multiple times because it doesn't work the first time. It cuts off while loading games and playing games it's not running hot it doesn't have any dust inside and I only use it to play video games and I'm not overclocking and it's not overheating. My GPU went out in 13 months from the day I bought it. Acer didn't want to honor the 2year hardware warranty. I had to send it through the store I purchased feom. Acer reps are useless and rude.
customer_reviews.author: LH

product_meta.title: Acer Predator Helios 500 PH517-51-72NU Gaming Laptop, Intel Core i7-8750H, GeForce GTX 1070 Overclockable Graphics, 17.3" Full HD 144Hz G-Sync Display, 16GB DDR4, 256GB PCIe NVMe SSD, 1TB HDD
product_meta.description: Acer Predator Helios 500 PH517-51-72NU Gaming Laptop comes with these high level specs: 8th Generation Intel Core i7-8750H Processor 2.2GHz with Turbo Boost Technology up to 4.1GHz (9MB Smart cache), Windows 10 Home, 17.3" Full HD (1920 x 1080) LED-backlit IPS display with NVIDIA G-SYNC technology, 144Hz Refresh Rate, 300nit Brightness, 16:9 aspect ratio, 72% NTSC, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 Overclockable Graphics with 8GB of dedicated GDDR5 VRAM, 16GB DDR4 2666MHz Memory, 256GB PCIe NVMe SSD, 1TB 5400RPM SATA Hard Drive, Waves MaxxAudio sound technology, Acer True Harmony Plus Technology, Two Built-in Stereo Speakers with Subwoofer, Killer DoubleShot Pro Wireless-AC 1550 802.11ac… WiFi featuring 2x2 MU-MIMO technology (Dual-Band 2.4GHz and 5GHz), Killer Ethernet E2500 10/100/1000 Gigabit Ethernet LAN (RJ-45 port), Bluetooth 5.0, HD Webcam (1280 x 720) supporting Super High Dynamic Range (SHDR), 2 - Thunderbolt 3 (Full USB 3.1 Type C) Ports, 3 - USB 3.0 Ports (one featuring Power-off Charging), 1 - Display Port, 1 - HDMI 2.0 with HDCP support, 4-cell Li-Ion Battery (4810 mAh), Up to 3.5-hours Battery Life, 8.82 lbs. | 4.0 kg (system unit only) (NH.Q3NAA.003). Maximum Power Supply Wattage - 230 W
feature_bullets: 8th Generation Intel Core i7-8750H 6-Core Processor (Up to 4.1GHz)
NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 Overclockable Graphics with 8GB of dedicated GDDR5 VRAM
17.3" Full HD (1920 x 1080) LED-backlit IPS display with NVIDIA G-SYNC technology (144Hz Refresh Rate, 300nit Brightness & 72% NTSC )
16GB DDR4 2666MHz Memory, 256GB PCIe NVMe SSD & 1TB 5400RPM HDD
Backlit four-zoned RGB Keyboard |Killer DoubleShot Pro Wireless-AC | 2 - Thunderbolt 3 (Full USB 3.1 Type C) Port | Dual All-Metal Aero Blade 3D Fans
